themes: Exclusion of experienced artists from grants
Marginalization of women artists, especially over 40
Caregiver roles as a barrier for women artists
Need for data-driven recognition of women's challenges
key_phrases: Allow artists of tenure to receive grants- not just DEI checklists
These artists bring leverage to the program
acknowledge that WOMEN artists are also marginalized, especially those over 40
typically in caregiver roles on top of trying to make it as an artist
the panel told me that women weren't marginalized in music and that is a FALSE assumption
There is a LOT of data that shows that women are indeed marginalized and in need of support
barriers_identified: Exclusion of experienced artists from grant eligibility
Grant criteria focused solely on DEI checklists
Lack of recognition for women artists' marginalization
solutions_proposed: Allow artists of tenure to receive grants
Acknowledge and address marginalization of women artists, especially over 40
Use data to inform support for women artists
